name: 吳明偉
objective:
本課程主要是介紹金屬、陶瓷、高分子材料之先進製造技術，以利修課學生能了解各種材料製程之原理、限制及其應用領域。另外，課程中也將介紹真空製程在材料製造所扮演的角色，並介紹基礎真空技術及理論。課程後半段將聚焦在材料的 3D 列印 (積層製造) 技術，包含美國材料試驗協會 (ASTM) 所分類的七大類 3D 列印技術，如粉體床熔化成型、黏結劑噴塗等製程技術。
This course mainly introduces advanced manufacturing technologies of metals, ceramics, and polymer materials, so that students can understand the principles, limitations and application fields of various material manufacturing processes. In addition, the course will also introduce the role of the vacuum process in material manufacturing and introduce basic vacuum technology and theory. The second half of the course will focus on 3D printing (additive manufacturing) technology of materials, including the seven major categories of 3D printing technologies classified by the American Society for Testing and Materials (ASTM), such as powder bed fusion, binder jetting, and other AM technologies.
schedule:
第 1～5 週 金屬材料製程
第 6～8 週 真空製程技術
第 9 週 期中考
10～12 週 陶瓷材料製程
13～14 週 高分子材料製程
15～17 週 3D 列印製程
第 18 週 期末考
scorePolicy:
出缺勤： 20 分
期中考：40 分
期末考： 40 分
materials:
機械製造，呂立鑫等，高立圖書。
實用真空技術，呂登復，黎明書局。
其他自編教材
